thread.section_title: Summer In Italy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Summer In Italy | www.summerinitaly.com
thread.title: tracey johnson
thread.title_full: Summer In Italy reviewed by tracey johnson

author: tracey johnson
title: tracey johnson
text: I have just booked a property and I am very impressed with the great communication I have received! The website has a live chat option, I found this very useful as I browsed properties, someone was available to answer questions and provide assistance. I am in the US with a 7 hour time difference, even so, live chat was available to me. Excellent customer service and a great choice of reasonably priced properties.
